alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 02 at 3:07PM PST until January 05 at 10:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations 8 to 12 inches possible except 16 to 24 inches above 9000 feet. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult or impossible. Areas of reduced visibility due to blowing snow.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Watch means there is potential for significant snow accumulations that may impact travel. Continue to monitor the latest forecasts.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
